description: Palindromes of form n(n+2); or palindromes 1 less than a square.
links: P. De Geest, Palindromic quasipronic numbers of the form n(n+2)
prog: (ARIBAS): stop := 400000; m := 1; while m < stop do s := m*m - 1; if s = int_reverse(s) then write(s," "); end; inc(m); end;
author: _Patrick De Geest_
